name: Riverside Dr
description: A stretch of Riverside Drive, briefly enlivened by the joyful sounds of teenage activity. A group of youngsters are gathered on a nearby, perfectly manicured lawn, their laughter a cheerful counterpoint to the quiet hum of the neighborhood. They are a fleeting burst of youthful energy in the otherwise languid, sun-drenched afternoon. Riverside Drive continues its gentle descent, a pristine ribbon of asphalt winding through charming homes. The air is still, broken only by the distant, contented hum of traffic and the occasional, cheerful chirping of a bird.
